skins.shipDescription: V-class destroyer ©` Vampire, Hull Number D68!
skins.selfIntroduction: What is the knowledge you seek? ...I am the first V class destroyer of the royal family, the honorable Vampire. I was in escort and patrol missions, and I hath also witnessed the sinking of many allies... I will not fail come next time! Let us fight until the end, and drink the blood of our enemies dry together!
skins.acquisition: I am V class' destroyer, Vampire. Thine blood looks delectable! --That said, thou doth fancy to stare at mine spots, do you not?
skins.login: Perhaps thou wish to inquire what color I adorn myself with today?
skins.details: What? Dost thou have strange thoughts concerning destroyers?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm bored... There is nothing to do after the lights are out
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hey, hey~ How about let's do something exciting?
skins.secretaryIdle3: The Pacific is calm on this night? Well, that's not the case, I think?
skins.secretaryTouch: Where art thou touching? It is much better over there ...Done already? Hehehe, such a half-heart~
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Art thou treating me as a child? ... It tickles~ Wh-what? Over already?

skins.shipDescription: Those who fall in love with vampires are bound to suffer seven times more than their infatuation. After all, love is a poison which leads to death.
skins.acquisition: Those who fall in love with vampires are bound to suffer seven times more than their infatuator. After all, love is a poison which leads to death.
skins.login: Darling~ Where shall we date on this eve?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Cleaning is no task for a vampire! We can be lazy every once and a while!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm bored... Mine darling, how about a date?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Doth thou beseech the color of mine garmets today? Were thou not the one who dressed me on the morn~
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you elevating your love for me?

skins.shipDescription: What dost thee think of my new dress? Like it? Or love it~? Eheh~ 'tis written all over thy face. Next is... w-wait! I haven't put on my stockings yet!
skins.acquisition: What dost thee think of my new dress? Like it? Or love it~? Eheh~ 'tis written all over thy face. Next is... w-wait! I haven't put on my stockings yet!
skins.details: Commander, where art thee looking? ...! I-it's only because the dress is tight-fitting!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Dost thee have plans for tonight? Ehehe, I do~ I plan to cling to thee all night so thee cannot go anywhere~
skins.secretaryIdle2: My favourite meal? Ehehe, obviously the one after I have blown out the candles~
skins.secretaryIdle3: I wish to do fun things~ with the person I like~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, dost thee enjoy touching me? "My skin is smooth and fair?" Ehehe, I love thy sweet-talking~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ehehe, Commander is a pervert who only I could love~

skins.shipDescription: Commander, I am now a nurse, so thou hast no choice but to give me thy blood~! Hehe, just kidding~!
skins.acquisition: Commander, I am now a nurse, so thou hast no choice but to give me thy blood~! Hehe, just kidding~!
skins.details: Commander, dost thou long for my meticulous care~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, take thy wildest guess~ Am I really wearing anything underneath~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, thou hast been hard at work for so long~ Come hither and allow me to help thee unwind~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Seducing and taking care of thee are but two sides of the same coin! How does this big dummy not understand that?
skins.secretaryTouch: I just wanted to inspect thy body a little, but turns out thou art surprisingly healthy~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! I-I'm an angel in white, you know? Pervert!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, thou promised to go to the festival with me, right? If thou forgot, I shall have to give thee a nibble upon the neck, ehehe~
skins.acquisition: Commander, thou promised to go to the festival with me, right? If thou forgot, I shall have to give thee a nibble upon the neck, ehehe~
skins.login: Commander, art thou prepared to play with me until I'm satisfied?
skins.details: A Sakura-style yukata? What's that? For one like myself, only finery like this fits the occasion~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Nnh... Commander, how is this goldfish so hard to scoop? Hurry and help me!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmm... these "yukata" things are more interesting than I had thought. I will have to try wearing one next time.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, there appears to be something interesting over there. But I can't see... lift me onto thy shoulders?
skins.secretaryTouch: For one like myself, the night hath only begun. Thou art not allowed to be sleepy yet~

skins.shipDescription: Feast thine eyes upon Vampire's idol attire... is it not exquisite? Heheh, now thy gaze shall be fixed upon my performance alone~?
